params._vault: The vault address allowed to send messages

params._token: The token address to recover (address(0) for ETH)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._payInLzToken: Whether to pay in LZ token
params._recipient: Address of the recipient on the destination chain
params._token: Address of the token to send

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._recipient: Address of the recipient on the destination chain
params._token: Address of the token to send

params._remoteVault: The address of the vault on the destination chain

params._oft: The OFT contract address for this token

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

dstEidToVault(uint32).notice: Mapping of destination Endpoint ID to the allowed Vault address on that chain

emergencyRecover(address,address,uint256.notice: Recover tokens or ETH accidentally sent to the contract

quoteSendToVault(uint32,address,address,.notice: Quote the fee for sending tokens

sendToVault(uint32,address,address,uint2.notice: Send tokens to vault on another chain

setRemoteVault(uint32,address).notice: Set the allowed remote vault for a specific destination chain

setTokenConfig(address,address).notice: Set the configuration for a supported token

tokenToOft(address).notice: Mapping of token address to its corresponding OFT contract address

vault().notice: The vault address that is allowed to call sendStrategy

documentation.text: @notice The vault address that is allowed to call sendStrategy
@notice Mapping of token address to its corresponding OFT contract address
@notice Mapping of destination Endpoint ID to the allowed Vault address on that chain

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct SendParam memory,bool) view external returns (struct MessagingFee memory)
function (struct SendParam memory,struct MessagingFee memory,address) payable external returns (struct MessagingReceipt memory,struct OFTReceipt memory)
function (struct SendParam memory,struct MessagingFee memory,address) payable external returns (struct MessagingReceipt memory,struct OFTReceipt memory)
function (struct SendParam memory,bool) view external returns (struct MessagingFee memory)

 @param _newVault The new vault address
